snippet: Protesters called for respect for the rule of law and justice for a former newspaper editor who is in a hospital after a near-deadly assault.
abstract: Thousands of Hong Kong residents march through streets to voice support for freedom of the and to denounce violence against journalists; demonstration follows near-deadly attack on Kevin Lau Chun-to, former chief editor of newspaper Ming Pao.

byline.original: By MICHAEL FORSYTHE and CHRIS BUCKLEY

lead_paragraph: Protesters called for respect for the rule of law and justice for a former newspaper editor who is in a hospital after a near-deadly assault.

headline.main: Thousands in Hong Kong Support Wounded Editor
headline.print_headline: Thousands in Hong Kong Support Wounded Editor
